definition: to be accommodating in negotiating the boundary of one's field/fig. (of farmers in ancient times) to be good-hearted and honest
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
Yu Shun, one of Five legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4]
great person of the past/venerable forebear/the great and the good
lit. no one picks up lost articles in the street (idiom)/fig. honesty prevails throughout society
lit. each household provided for, enough for the individual (idiom); comfortably off
(Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
to secure a position/to take an official appointment
to respect talent and make use of ability (Mencius)
mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
